title: Lowell man now charged with murder in hit-and-run crash
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime Tito Nuth, 36, was arrested in October in connection with the August crash.
A Lowell man has now been indicted on a murder charge after a hit-and-run crash in August in the city left a 38-year-old man dead.

Tito Nuth, 36, was arraigned Tuesday in Middlesex Superior Court in Lowell on charges of murder and leaving the scene of personal injury or death, according to the Middlesex County District Attorney’s Office.

title: Westborough man convicted of murdering his mother in a hotel parking lot
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime A jury found Daniel Uhlman, 55, guilty of first-degree murder after an 11-day trial.
A Westborough man was convicted on Tuesday for the murder of his mother.
Following an 11-day trial, a jury found Daniel Uhlman, 55, guilty of first-degree murder and armed assault to murder a person over 60, according to the Middlesex County District Attorney’s Office.
